songs.title: KD4 - Tell me*
songs.lyrics:
Tell me something..

Are you really ready or are you frontin’?
Would I be wasting time if I gave you all this loving?
You know how niggas talk, but ain’t really saying nothing
I hope that ain't you, 'cause I know you know I’m crushing
Got me blushing, fantasizing, Bonnie and Clyding..
Riding, sitting pretty, pull right beside him
He handsome as fuck, but you already knew that
Been talking for a while but enough with that chit-chat..

Tell me…
Are you ready for what I’m ready for?
I may have heard you say it once, but are you really sure?
'Cuz I don’t want to bust a move if it’s premature
But my body is the wonderland and I’ll give you the tour

Tell me…
How it’s really going down
If its going to be gone then I gots to know now
You can’t hold me up but you can slow me down
You got options, but you know I’m the baddest thing around
